name: Valencia - Sun Grown - Robusto
additionalNotes: Valencia Cigars, from the makers of Camacho, mark the return of an enormously popular cigar brand from the late 1960’s and early 1970’s. Blended and rolled in one of the most famous factories in Honduras, the cigars feature a stunning golden brown Ecuadorian Connecticut or Habano wrapper atop a manufacturers secret blend of perfectly aged binder and long- filler tobaccos. Premium handmade Valencia cigars, available in Gordo, Robusto, and Toro, displays a creamy mellow to medium body profile while providing the cigar aficionado with engaging multi-layered notes of cocoa, sweet spice, leather, caramel, and toast. Available in Connecticut or Habano wrappers, with affordable price.
